properties.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Western Hampshire; Western Hampden
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 2:55AM EST until February 18 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
a coating to 1 inch of snow with perhaps up to 2 inches in far
northwest Massachusetts. Ice accumulations of a light glaze
following the snow.

* WHERE...Western Franklin MA, Western Hampshire MA and Western
Hampden MA Counties. Mainly for elevations at or above 1000
feet.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 5 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions late this morning and
especially this afternoon. The main concern is for elevations
near or above 1000 feet.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of snow develops late this
morning into early afternoon. The snow changes to a brief period
of sleet and freezing rain during the afternoon before changing
to all rain by early evening.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
